availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Christopher Columbus Price (Johnson County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Meek Price on July 5, 1857. Father of G. M. Price, Henry B. Magoffin Price, and Laura Belle Price. Merchant in Johnson County in 1860. Colonel of the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 4; Find A Grave, "Christopher Columbus Price (1837-1895)," Memorial #39344496, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=39344496 (accessed July 14, 2017); KYR-0002-022-0076.
